definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Why don't you go touch the drain or something?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼不去摸排水管或什麼的？

sentences.english: Have explained some views while laying for the drainage pipeline in the room.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了室內給排水管道敷設時的一些觀點。

sentences.english: Flap valve is mainly installed in the end of drainage pipeline to prevent extra water flow backward.
sentences.chinese: 拍門主要安裝在排水管道的尾端，用於防止外水倒灌。

sentences.english: In addition to the standard systems, this product line also provides sound-absorbing drainpipes that meet the most demanding requirements.
sentences.chinese: 除了標準排水系統，吉博力還提供靜音排水管道。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a washing machine water drain socket bolt belonging to draining pipeline fitting parts.
sentences.chinese: 洗衣機排水插口栓屬於排水管道配件。

sentences.english: All sewer or drain openings will be closed with a properly secured, perforated metal cover.
sentences.chinese: 都有的排水管道必須封閉，用有孔金屬蓋板蓋緊。

sentences.english: Melted frost voluntarily evaporates, no need drainpipe.
sentences.chinese: 化霜水自動蒸發，無需接駁排水管。

sentences.english: Cesspits and cesspools shall be available in the catering trade not within the service sectors of drainage network.
sentences.chinese: 在排水管網服務區外的飲食業應當設污水池或化糞池。

sentences.english: Drainage pipes and gutters are being installed.
sentences.chinese: 公路上還新修了排水管道和邊溝。

sentences.english: The drain will plug up if you let grease settle in it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你讓油脂積存，排水管就會堵塞。

sentences.english: Install drain hose to vent tube at bottom of pump.
sentences.chinese: 在水泵底部安裝排放管到排水管。

sentences.english: Water escaped rapidly from the drainpipe.
This research probes into the feasibility of compost and reuse as construction materials of drain sludge.
sentences.chinese: 對利用城市排水管污泥進行堆肥和做建材進行了探討。

sentences.english: Ex: the thief fled from the police by climbing down a drain pipe .
sentences.chinese: 小偷沿著排水管爬下，逃開了警察。

sentences.english: Reverse flow, backwash, gauges, drain connections and sight glasses can all be economically incorporated.
sentences.chinese: 該設備裝有逆流，反衝洗裝置，排水管接口和觀察鏡。

sentences.english: Put a bucket under the hole in the drain pipe to catch any overflow.
sentences.chinese: 在排水管的那個洞下放個水桶接住漏出的水。

definition: drain/underground drainpipe/floor gutter/25th of 2nd lunar month
